pageContext.description: Part of a bronze founder's hoard of 62 pieces. Composed of fragments of the following. 24 socketed  celts. 6 swords. 4 spearheads. 2 knife sockets. 1 sword chape. 1 tang of sickle. Also 15 lumps of metal.7 fragments of indecisive shapes. 1 socketed gouge and 1 gouge socket.
pageContext.other: This is written on a plain card with no printed headings. There are no measurements or descriptions other than the ones given here and no drawings.
pageContext.collection: Colchester Museum,  purchased by the Colchester Corporation 1896,  (trans Essex Arch. Soc. NS VI 173)
pageContext.toSearch: Southchurch, Southend-on-sea, Southend-on-sea, Southend-on-sea Ss1, UK
